install.name: Content - AddThis
install.author: AddThis, LLC
install.description: Help your visitors promote your site! The AddThis Joomla Plugin allows any visitor to bookmark your pages easily with many popular services. Sign up for an AddThis.com account to see how your visitors are sharing your content--which services they're using for sharing, which content is shared the most, and more. It's all free--even the pretty charts and graphs. This module only works with Joomla 1.5.x. To remove the button from an article, add a the custom tag {addthis off} in the article content.

field.name: profile_id
field.label: AddThis Profile ID
field.description: Profile ID under your AddThis account

field.name: custom_url
field.label: Custom Button URL
field.description: URL for your button If you selected ''Custom Button Image'' above

field.name: custom_button_code
field.label: Custom Button Code
field.description: Your custom AddThis code If you selected ''Custom Button'' above

field.name: toolbox_services
field.label: Toolbox Services
field.description: Services to be shown in the toolbox. Applicable only if toolbox mode is selected

field.name: toolbox_more_services_mode
field.label: Toolbox more services mode
field.description: Visibility of compact menu when toolbox mode is selected

field.name: icon_dimension
field.label: Toolbox icon dimension
field.description: Size of the icons to be shown in toolbox

field.name: show_frontpage
field.label: Show on frontpage
field.description: Show the AddThis button on the frontpage

field.name: addthis_language
field.label: AddThis language
field.description: Language in which the button and menu has to be shown

field.name: addthis_brand
field.label: Brand
field.description: Text label that shows on the top right of the menu

field.name: addthis_header_color
field.label: Header Color
field.description: Custom color to use for the text foreground in the header of the menu, in hex. (ex: ''#ff0000''). Leave blank for default.

field.name: addthis_header_background
field.label: Header Background
field.description: Custom color to use as a background in the header of the menu, in hex. (ex: ''#0000ff''). Leave blank for default.

field.name: addthis_services_compact
field.label: Services to show in the compact menu
field.description: Comma-separated list of services to show in the compact menu. Leave blank for default.

field.name: addthis_services_exclude
field.label: Services to exclude
field.description: Comma-separated list of services to be excluded from the menu. Leave blank for default.

field.name: addthis_services_expanded
field.label: Services to show in the expanded menu
field.description: Comma-separated list of services to be shown in the expanded menu. Leave blank for default.

field.name: addthis_services_custom
field.label: Custom services to show in the menu
field.description: Specify your own AddThis bookmarking service like so:{name: 'My Service',url: 'http://share.example.com?url={{URL}}',icon: 'http://example.com/icon.jpg'. All three fields must be present for each custom service.

field.name: addthis_offset_top
field.label: Menu Top Offset
field.description: Vertical offset for the drop-down window (in pixels). Leave blank for default.

field.name: addthis_offset_left
field.label: Menu Left Offset
field.description: Horizontal offset for the drop-down window (in pixels). Leave blank for default.

field.name: addthis_hover_delay
field.label: Hover Delay
field.description: Delay in opening of the compact menu in milliseconds (minimum 50, maximum 500). Leave blank for default.

field.name: addthis_click
field.label: Menu on click of the button
field.description: If true compact menu will appear only upon click of the sharing button. Leave blank for default.

field.name: addthis_hover_direction
field.label: Menu open direction
field.description: Normally, we show the compact menu in the direction of the user's browser that has the most space. You can override this behavior with this setting.

field.name: addthis_use_addressbook
field.label: Show Address Book
field.description: If true, the user will be able import their contacts from popular webmail services when using AddThis's email sharing. Leave blank for default.

field.name: addthis_508_compliant
field.label: 508 Compliant
field.description: If true, clicking the AddThis button will open a new window to a page supporting sharing without JavaScript. Leave blank for default.

field.name: addthis_data_track_clickback
field.label: Track click backs
field.description: Set to true to allow us to append a variable to your URLs upon sharing. We'll use this to track how many people come back to your content via links shared with AddThis. Highly recommended. Leave blank for default.

field.name: addthis_hide_embed
field.label: Hide Flash Content
field.description: Temporarily hide flash objects that intersect the menu. Default is true.

field.name: addthis_use_css
field.label: Load AddThis CSS
field.description: If false, we will not load our standard CSS file, allowing you to style everything yourself without incurring the cost of an additonal load.

field.name: addthis_ga_tracker
field.label: Google Analytics tracking object
field.description: Google Analytics tracking object, or the name of a global variable that references it. If set, we'll send AddThis tracking events to Google, so you can have integrated reporting.

field.name: position
field.label: Button Position
field.description: Position of addthis button in the content
